column2: geom_half_boxplot(aes(x=x %>% as.numeric(), y = Value, color = V_presentation3graph), position = position_nudge(x = -.25), side = "r",outlier.shape = NA, center = TRUE, errorbar.draw = FALSE, width = .2) +
geom_half_violin(aes(x=x %>% as.numeric(), y = Value, color = V_presentation3graph), position = position_nudge(x = -.3), side = "l") +
aes(x=x, y=Value), method = "lm", formula = y ~ x, geom = "smooth") +
aes(x=x, y=Value), method = "lm", formula = y ~ x, geom = "smooth") +
